content.title: Celebrate your wedding at a holiday house.

content.text:
Celebrate your wedding at a holiday house.

Choosing a suitable locale for your wedding reception is a key question for all bridal couples. A somewhat different option  is to hold your wedding in your very own holiday home. Interhome has compiled a list of reasons why these special wedding locations are so advantageous:

Benefits

  • A wedding at a holiday home is a very personal and individual experience. Spend a weekend with your loved ones in a beautiful setting - the undisturbed location creates a unique sense of togetherness. A wonderful event that you can share with your guests – and no one will disturb your idyll.
  • You can celebrate somewhere extraordinary – be it in a romantic castle, a French country house, an Italian villa or a Spanish finca. The unique atmosphere will make your wedding even more special and unforgettable, and add an extra touch of romance. If you choose to hold your ceremony in the south, you will benefit from the perfect backdrop, spacious gardens and usually also great weather. Where else could you say “I do” by the sea, for example?
  •  It is possible to combine your nuptials and honeymoon – once guests have departed, the holiday home is all yours.
  •  You have full discretion on all wedding plans, from the site to accommodation to decoration and design. You can also celebrate for as long as you like. In your holiday home, you’re the boss!
  • A holiday home is more affordable than putting guests up in a hotel – plus you can enjoy having them around. You won’t often find extras in hotels such as a swimming pool, sauna or hot tub that you can share with your guests.

The icing on the cake is the option of hiring a wedding planner to take care of all the organisation. This means that you won’t have to worry about anything on the most beautiful day of your life.

Discover some sugggestions for your wedding organisation in a holiday house.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: A stay in a holiday house or apartment offers so many advantages: spend your time exactly the way you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules and pace. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Kick back and enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your own holiday letting.
